attributes.action: Force banks and building societies to give the full rate cut to consumers in their new and old products.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Financial mortgage institutions are ripping off the consumer by increasing their margins on new and old mortgage products.
This means that the efforts of Governement to ease the effects fo the credit crunch are being negated by greedy bankers.
Government must act to force financial mortgage institutions  to give to consumers the full effect of a Bank of England rate cut.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
